pages.text: $(li)The Nether City is a big structure that can be found in the Nether.$(br)$(li)This place is inhabited by $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/wither_skeleton)Wither Skeletons$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/blaze)Blazes$(/l).$(br)$(li)It is a dangerous place, but you can find interesting $(l:patchouli:perks/loot_chest)Loot Chests$(/l).
